1976617.effect: If this card is Normal Summoned: You can activate this effect; during the End Phase, you can add 1 "Scarlet Seraphim" from your Deck or GY to to your hand. You can only use this effect of "Byzantium Kitsune" once per turn. If you control "Scarlet Seraphim", "Cyan Diviner", and "Steel Crusader", this card's original ATK/DEF becomes 1500/2400, also your opponent cannot target it with cards effects. You can shuffle this card and 1 "Scarlet Seraphim", 1 "Cyan Diviner", and 1 "Steel Crusader" from your GY into your Deck; add 1 "Color Flash" from your Deck to your hand.
1976617.name: Byzantium Kitsune

1972826.effect: If a face-up LIGHT monster(s) you control is destroyed by battle or an opponent's card effect: You can Special Summon this card from your hand, then you can Special Summon 1 of the destroyed monsters in Defense Position, but it cannot activate its effects this turn. You can only use this effect of "Cataclysmic Cryptic Coronus" once per turn.
1972826.name: Cataclysmic Cryptic Coronus

1972842.effect: If a face-up DARK monster(s) you control is destroyed by battle or an opponent's card effect: You can Special Summon this card from your hand, then you can destroy up to 2 cards on the field. You can only use this effect of "Cataclysmic Cthonic Crescent" once per turn.
1972842.name: Cataclysmic Cthonic Crescent

1976625.effect: If this card is Normal Summoned: You can activate this effect; during the End Phase, you can add 1 "Steel Crusader" from your Deck or GY to to your hand. You can only use this effect of "Cyan Diviner" once per turn. If you control "Scarlet Seraphim", "Steel Crusader", and "Byzantium Kitsune", this card's original DEF becomes 3000, also if another monster(s) you control would be destroyed by battle or card effect, you can destroy this card instead.
1976625.name: Cyan Diviner

1976621.effect: If this card is Normal Summoned: You can activate this effect; during the End Phase, you can add 1 "Cyan Diviner" from your Deck or GY to to your hand. You can only use this effect of "Scarlet Seraphim" once per turn. If you control "Cyan Diviner", "Steel Crusader", and "Byzantium Kitsune", this card's original ATK becomes 2500, also it cannot be destroyed by battle.
1976621.name: Scarlet Seraphim

1976628.effect: If this card is Normal Summoned: You can activate this effect; during the End Phase, you can add 1 "Byzantium Kitsune" from your Deck or GY to to your hand. You can only use this effect of "Steel Crusader" once per turn. If you control "Scarlet Seraphim", "Cyan Diviner", and "Byzantium Kitsune", this card's original ATK/DEF becomes 2000/1500, also it cannot be destroyed by card effects.

1972910.effect: You cannot Summon monsters, except monsters with 1850 ATK, 200 DEF, and/or 1500 DEF. You can activate the effects of Level 8 "Cataclysmic" monsters in your hand when a monster your opponent controls is destroyed by battle or card effect. If a Spellcaster monster(s) you control whose original ATK is 1850 or whose original DEF is 1500 is destroyed by battle or an opponent's card effect: You can draw 1 card, then place 1 card from your hand on either the top or bottom of your Deck. You cannot use this effect of "Cataclysmic Spiritual Art - Owari" this turn when another monster(s) with that same Attribute is destroyed.
1972910.name: Cataclysmic Spiritual Art - Owari

1976636.effect:
Reveal you hand to your opponent; apply the following effects in sequence based off the cards in your hand and on your field.
● "Scarlet Seraphim": Inflict damage to your opponent equal to half of the ATK of the monster your opponent controls with the highest ATK (your choice if tied) , then if you control "Scarlet Seraphim", destroy that monster.
● "Cyan Diviner": Gain 2000 LP, then if you control "Cyan Diviner", draw 1 card.
● "Steel Crusader": All monsters you control gain 1000 ATK/DEF until the end of your next turn, then if you control "Steel Crusader", destroy 1 Spell/Trap on the field.
● "Byzantium Kitsune": All monsters your opponent controls lose 1000 ATK/DEF until the end of your opponent's next turn, then if you control "Byzantium Kitsune", banish up to 3 cards from the GY.
1976636.name: Color Flash

1638848.effect: You can discard this card; add 1 "Palace of the Elemental Lords" from your Deck or GY to your hand. You can only use this effect of "Elementsaber Pahi Kaua" once per turn. Once per turn, if this card is in the GY: You can declare 1 Attribute; this card in the GY becomes that Attribute until the end of this turn.

1413472.effect: You can send 2 other "Elementsaber" monsters from your hand to the GY; Special Summon this card from your hand. (Quick Effect): You can target 1 "Elemental Lord" monster in your GY; apply that monster's effect that activates when it is Special Summoned, then banish that card. You can only use each effect of "Elementsaber Molehu Mana" once per turn.
1413472.name: Elementsaber Molehu Mana

1629865.effect:
Activate 1 of these effects:
● Send "Elementsaber" monsters from your Deck to your GY, equal to the number of cards your opponent controls.
● Add 1 "Elementsaber" monster from your Deck to your hand with a Level equal to or less than the number of cards your opponent controls.
You can only activate 1 "Elemental Pillars" per turn.

1981445.effect: You can send this card from your hand or field to the GY; draw 1 card, then immediately after this effect resolves, Normal Summon 1 "Genex" monster from your hand. You can only use this effect of "Genex Gravitron" once per turn.

1981463.effect: (This card's name is always treated as "Genex Controller") (Quick Effect): Immediately after this effect resolves, Synchro Summon using this card in your hand and "Genex" monsters you control as material. You can only use this effect of "R-Genex Controller" once per turn.

1981433.effect: If you control another "Genex" monster: You can Special Summon this card from your hand, but reduce its Level by 1. If this card is sent to the GY: You can add 1 "Genex" monster from your Deck to your hand. You can only use each effect of "R-Genex Pipeline" once per turn.

1981837.effect:
1 "Genex" Tuner + 1 non-Tuner monster
You can send 1 "Genex" monster from your Deck to the GY, while this card remains face-up on the field, its Attribute is also treated as that monster's Attribute, and it gains that monster's original ATK and DEF. You can target a "Genex" monster in your GY with an ATK/DEF lower than this card's; reduce this card's ATK/DEF by that monster's, then Special Summon that monster. You can only use each effect of "Genex Ally Capacitor" once per turn.

1981470.effect:
1 Tuner + 1 non-Tuner monster

1981470.name: R-Genex Caller

1216140.effect: If this card is targeted by an effect: You can add 1 level 4 or lower "Blackclaw" monster from your Deck to your hand, except "Blackclaw - Cyles the New Born". If this card is in your GY: You can target 1 face-up card on the field ; Place 1 Blackclaw Counter on the target, and if you do, Special Summon this card from your GY, but banish it when it leave the field. You can only use each effects of "Blackclaw - Cyles the New Born" once per turn.

1218681.effect: If this card is targeted by an effect: You can draw 1 card. Cannot be Special Summoned, except by a "Blackclaw" monster's effect. You can only use each effect of "Blackclaw - Iris the Queen's Equerry" once per turn.

1218637.effect: If this card is targeted by an effect: You can target 1 face-down card your opponent controls; return the target to the hand. You can only use each effects of "Blackclaw - Lola the Ocean Traveller" once per turn.
1218637.name: Blackclaw - Lola the Ocean Traveller

1218172.effect: If this card is targeted by an effect: You can add 1 "Blackclaw" Spell/Trap Card from your Deck to your hand. You can only use each effects of "Blackclaw - Katie the Flowery Gunner" once per turn.
1218579.name: Blackclaw - Katie the Flowery Gunner

1218310.effect: If this card is targeted by an effect: You can target 1 face-up card your opponent controls; return the target to the hand. You can only use each effects of "Blackclaw - Paula the Burning Swordman" once per turn.
1218310.name: Blackclaw - Paula the Burning Swordman

1218342.effect: When a "Blackclaw" monster is Normal Summoned to your side of the field: You can add 1 "Blackclaw" monster from your Deck with a highter ATK to your hand. If this card is targeted by an effect: You can gains 1000 LP. You can only use each effects of "Blackclaws Bath" once per turn.

1218209.effect: All "Blackclaw" monsters on your field gain 100 ATK/DEF for each Blackclaw Counter on the field. 1218423.effect: Activate 1 of these effects. 1218767.effect: If you control a "Blackclaw" monster: Target Set cards in your opponent's field, up to the number of "Blackclaw" monsters you control; destroy them. If you control min. 2 "Blackclaw" Synchro Monsters, you can activate this card from your hand.

If this card is Synchro Summoned using 2 "Blackclaw" monsters as Material, you can treated this card as a Tuner monster while face-up on the field. This card gains 200 ATK for each "Blackclaw" monster in your GY. If this card is targeted by an opponent's effect: You can add 1 "Blackclaw" Spell/Trap Card from your Deck or GY to your hand. When this card is destroyed and sent to the GY: You can target 1 "Blackclaw" monster in your GY, except Synchro Monster; Special Summon it.

You can only use this effect of "Elite Blackclaw - Quiaris the Sound of the Storm" once per turn. If this card is targeted by an effect: Inflict 500 damage to your opponent. During your Main Phase, you can Normal Summon 1 "Blackclaw" monster in addition to your Normal Summon/Set. (You can only gain this effect once per turn.)

If this card is targeted by an opponent's effect: negate the effect. (Quick effect) When your opponent activates a card or effect that targets exactly 1 other face-up card on your field, or when your opponent targets an other "Blackclaw" monster for an attack: That card/effect/attack now targets this card. You can only use each effect of "Elite Blackclaw - Megana the Host of the Nightmare" once per turn.

You can only control 1 face-up "Legendary Blackclaw - Cyles the Forgotten Member". If this card is Synchro Summoned: Place 2 Blackclaw Counter on this card. If this Synchro Summoned card is targeted by an effect, remove 1 Blackclaw Counter from this card: your opponent can only Special Summon 2 monsters from the Extra Deck for the rest of this turn (even if this card leaves the field). You can target cards your opponent controls, up to the number of other "Blackclaw" Synchro Monsters you control; destroy them. You can only use each effect of "Legendary Blackclaw - Cyles the Forgotten Member" once per turn.

You can banish 1 "Blackclaw" monster from your GY, then target 1 monster your opponent controls; banish it. If this Synchro Summoned card in its owner's control is destroyed by an opponent's card: You can Special Summon 1 "Blackclaw" Synchro Monster with 3000 or less ATK from your Extra Deck. (This is treated as a Synchro Summon.) You can only use this effect of "Legendary Blackclaw - Angelica the Light from Heaven" once per turn.

1219456.treated_as: Legendary Blackclaw - Angelica the Light from Heaven

1874768.effect: If this card is Normal or Special Summoned, you can discard 1 card; Special Summon one "The Silent" monster from your hand or Deck. You can only use this effect of "The Silent Child" once per turn.

1877020.effect: Target one "The Silent" monster in your GY; Special Summon that target. During either player's turn, you can banish this card from your GY, except the turn this card was sent to the GY; destroy cards your opponent controls up to the number of "The Silent" monsters you control.

1877080.effect: All "The Silent" monsters you control gain 300 ATK/DEF. If a "The Silent" monster you control is destroyed by battle or by card effect: you can draw 1 card, then place one card from your hand on the bottom of the Deck. You can only control one "The Silent Otherworld."
1877080.name: The Silent Otherworld

1874742.effect: If you control a face-up "The Silent" monster, you can Special Summon this card from your hand or GY. You can only Special Summon "The Silent Nurse" this way up to twice per turn. 1877069.effect: When this card is activated: Look at the top 3 cards of your Deck, then you can reveal 1 "The Silent" card among them, and add it to your hand, also place the remaining cards on top of your Deck in any order. All "The Silent" monsters you control gain 500 ATK/DEF.

1874715.effect: If this card is sent to the GY as material for the Synchro or Link Summon of a "The Silent" monster: you can Special Summon up to two "The Silent Screechers" from your hand or Deck. You can only use this effect of "The Silent Screecher" once per turn.

1874825.effect:
2 "The Silent" monsters
If this card is Link Summoned: you can add a "The Silent" Spell or Trap from your Deck to your hand. You can only use this effect of "Abstract, the Silent Father" once per turn. All "The Silent" monsters this card points to gain 200 ATK & DEF.
1874825.name: Abstract, The Silent Father

1874758.effect:
1 Tuner + 1 or more non-Tuner "The Silent" monsters

1874758.treated_as: Jess and Wyatt, The Silent Twins

1874699.effect:
3+ "The Silent" monsters

During your Main Phase (Quick Effect), you can send this card to the GY; this turn, when a "The Silent" monster attacks a Defense Position monster, deal piercing battle damage to your opponent.

1874796.effect:
3+ "The Silent" monsters
Cannot be Tributed or used as Fusion or Link Material. If this card is Link Summoned: Give control of this card to your opponent. If this card attacks a "The Silent" monster, before damage calculation, destroy that opponent's monster. During the End Phase of the next turn after this card was Link Summoned: banish all monsters you control, except this card, and if you do, give control of this card to your opponent. You can only use this effect of "Wyatt, The Silent Survivor" once per turn.
1874796.name: Wyatt, The Silent Survivor

1977407.effect:
Equip only to a monster you control. Halve the equipped monster's original ATK/DEF. When attack is declared involving the equipped monster: You can activate 1 of these effects.
● It gains 1000 ATK/DEF.
● Draw 1 card.
● Target 1 other card on the field, except the battling monsters; destroy it.

● The first time this card would be destroyed by battle each turn, it is not destroyed. 
● If this card battles an opponent's monster, after damage calculation: Banish that opponent's monster.

1977411.effect: Equip only to a monster your opponent controls. The equipped monster loses 1500 ATK/DEF. You can only use this effect of "The Ultimate Hammer" once per turn.

1977409.effect:

● 1 or higher: This card gains 500 ATK/DEF.
● 3 or higher: Once per turn, during the End Phase: You can target 1 Set card on the field; shuffle it.
● 5 or higher: Your opponent cannot target this card with card effects.

You can only control 1 "Clockwork Greatblade". You can only activate 1 "Clockwork Greatblade" per turn.

Equip only to a monster you control. It gains the following effect.

1977400.effect: Equip only to a monster your opponent controls. The equipped monster's effects are negated. It's original ATK/DEF becomes 0. It cannot be destroyed by battle. During your opponent's turn, if a monster(s) with ATK higher than the monster you control with the highest ATK is Special Summoned to your opponent's field while this card was in your GY: You can equip this card from your GY to 1 of those monsters, but banish it when it leaves the field. You can only use this effect of "Lingering Torment" once per turn.
1977400.name: Lingering Torment

1977406.effect:
Equip only to a monster you control. It gains the following effect.

1977396.effect: The equipped monster gains 500 ATK/DEF. You can only activate 1 "Shimmering Storage Sword" per turn.

1977402.effect: Equip only to a monster you control. Once per turn, during the End Phase if an attack was declared this turn: You can draw 1 card, then, you can send this card to the GY, and if you do, draw cards equal to the number of Equip Cards on the field with different names.
1977402.name: Sacred Sword

1970790.effect: When this card is Special Summoned: You can add 1" Chibright" card from your Deck to your hand, except "Chibright Messenger Maharo". 1970790.name: Chibright Messenger Maharo

1970799.effect: This card is also treated as a LIGHT monster. This effect cannot be negated. Cannot be Normal Summoned/Set. (Quick Effect): You can banish up to 3 Link monsters from your field and/or GY, including 1 "Chibright" monster; Special Summon this card from your hand or GY. This card's ATK becomes the total Link Rating of all monsters banished by this effect x 800. Once per Chain (Quick Effect): You can reduce this ATK by exactly 800; banish 1 card on the field. You can only activate this effect as Chain Link 2 or higher.

1970819.effect: Banish the top card of your Deck face-down, then take 1 "Chibright" card from your Deck or GY, and either add it to your hand or Set it to your side of the field. You can only activate 1 "Chibright Archive Adventures" per turn.

1970802.effect:
Send the top 3 cards of your Deck to the GY; Special Summon this card as an Effect Monster (LIGHT/Level 5/Fairy/800 ATK/1200 DEF) with the following effect, then you can have 1 monster on the field gain 800 ATK. (This card is NOT treated as a Trap.)

1970801.effect:
Send the top 3 cards of your Deck to the GY; Special Summon this card as an Effect Monster (DARK/Level 5/Fairy/1200 ATK/800 DEF) with the following effect, then you can have 1 monster on the field lose 800 ATK. (This card is NOT treated as a Trap.)
● When a "Chibright" Link monster is Special Summoned: You can discard 1 card, then target 1 face-up Spell/Trap on the field; negate its effects until the end of this turn. You can only use this effect of "Chibright Summon - Witch Winora" once per turn.
1970801.name: Chibright Summon - Witch Winora

1970791.effect:
1 Level 3 or lower Fairy monster
When this card is Link Summoned: You can draw 1 card, and if you do, send 1 "Chibright" card from your hand or field to the GY. If this card is sent to the GY as Link material: You can target 1 Link monster on the field; it gains 400 ATK. You can only use each effect of "Chibright Lancela Lunirva" once per turn.
1970791.name: Chibright Lancela Lunirva

1970795.effect:
2+ Effect Monsters, including a Fairy monster
This card is also treated as a WATER and WIND monster while banished or on the field or in the GY. Once per turn (Quick Effect): You can target 1 Link monster in the GYs; this card gains ATK equal to that monster's Link Rating x 800. If this card declares an attack on a monster with less ATK than this card's, your opponent cannot activate cards or effects until the end of the Damage Step. During the End Phase: You can target 1 monster on the field; reduce its ATK to 0.
1970795.name: Chibright Twilight Triad

1970794.effect:
2 monsters, including a "Chibright" Link monster
When this card is Link Summoned: You can target 1 Level 4 or lower Fairy monster in your GY; Special Summon it, also for the rest of this turn after this card is Summoned, you cannot Special Summon monsters with 2000 or more ATK. During the Main Phase (Quick Effect): You can, immediately after this effect resolves, Link Summon 1 "Chibright" monster, using this card as material, and if you do, that monster gains 400 ATK. You can only use each effect of "Chibright Seraphim Stelli" once per turn.
1970794.name: Chibright Seraphim Stelli

1966004.effect: If this card is Normal or Special Summoned: You can Special Summon 1 of your "Hellvil" monsters that is banished or in the GY in Defense Position, but its effects are negated. If this card is banished: You can target 1 "Dark Agreement" Spell/Trap card in your GY; return it to your hand. You can only use each effect of "Hellvil Kolmizich" once per turn.
1966004.name: Hellvil Kolmizich

1966026.effect: If this card is sent to the GY by the effect of a "Hellvil" monster or "Dark Agreement" Spell/Trap: You can target 1 "Hellvil" monster in your GY, except "Hellvil Mizrerog"; banish it, and if you do, draw 1 card. If this card is banished: You can Special Summon 1 "Hellvil" monster from your Deck, except "Hellvil Mizrerog", but negate its effects, also, you cannot Special Summon monsters from the Extra Deck for the rest of the turn, except Fiend monsters. You can only use each effect of "Hellvil Mizrerog" once per turn.
1966026.name: Hellvil Mizrerog

1966001.effect: If this card is Normal or Special Summoned: You can take 1 "Dark Agreement" Spell/Trap card from your Deck, and either Set it in your Spell/Trap Zone or add it to your hand. If this card is used as Material for the Fusion Summon of a "Hellvil" monster: You can target up to 2 of your "Hellvil" monsters that were banished or in the GY; shuffle those cards into the Deck, and if you do, draw 1 card. You can only use each effect of "Hellvil Thagdrath" once per turn.
1966001.name: Hellvil Thagdrath

1966018.effect: If this card is sent to the GY by the effect of a "Hellvil" monster or "Dark Agreement" Spell/Trap: You can target 1 "Hellvil" monster in your GY; banish it, and if you do, Special Summon this card. If this card is used as Material for the Link Summon of a "Hellvil" monster: You can return 1 banished "Hellvil" monster to the GY, then target 1 monster your opponent controls; return it to the hand. You can only use each effect of "Hellvil Trogtharon" once per turn.
1966018.name: Hellvil Trogtharon

1965996.effect: If this card is Normal or Special Summoned: You can add 1 "Hellvil" monster from your Deck to your hand. If this card is in your GY: You can Fusion Summon 1 "Hellvil" Fusion Monster from your Extra Deck, by banishing Fusion Materials listed on it from your hand or GY, including this card. You can only use 1 of these effects of "Hellvil Vorath" per turn, and only once that turn.
1965996.name: Hellvil Vorath

1966010.effect: If this card is in the GY while you control a "Hellvil" Fusion Monster (Quick Effect): You can banish this card, then target 1 monster your opponent controls that was Special Summoned from the Extra Deck; negate its effects until the End Phase. If a "Hellvil" Fusion monster would be destroyed by battle or card effect, return this banished card to your GY instead. You can only use each effect of "Hellvil Zarkorith" once per turn.
1966010.name: Hellvil Zarkorith

1966114.effect:
When this card is activated: You can Special Summon 1 "Hellvil" monster from your hand or GY. You can only activate 1 "Dark Agreement with the Pathfinder" per turn. You can only use each of the following effects of "Dark Agreement with the Pathfinder" once per turn. 
● You can send 1 "Hellvil" monster from your hand to the GY, then target 1 monster your opponent controls, banish it, and if you do, until the end of the next turn, its effects are negated, as well as the activated effects and effects on the field of monsters with the same original name.
● You can target 1 "Hellvil" monster that is banished or in the GY; place it on the bottom of the Deck.
Once per turn, during your Standby Phase: Banish the top 3 cards from your Deck, face-down.
1966114.name: Dark Agreement with the Pathfinder

1966099.effect: When this card is activated: Add 1 "Hellvil" monster from your Deck to your hand. You cannot Special Summon monsters from the Extra Deck the turn you activate this effect, except Fiend monsters. If you would Link Summon a Link-2 or higher "Hellvil" monster, you can also use "Hellvil" monsters from your hand as Link Material. If your "Hellvil" monster would be destroyed by battle or card effect, you can shuffle 1 banished card into the Deck instead. You can only use each effect of "Dark Agreement with the Mighty Hellvil" once per turn. Once per turn, during your Standby Phase: Banish the top 3 cards from your Deck, face-down.
1966099.name: Dark Agreement with the Mighty Hellvil
1966099.treated_as: Dark Agreement with the Mighty Hellvil

1966032.effect: If your "Hellvil" Fusion or Link monster battles, your opponent cannot activate cards or effects until the end of the Damage Step. During your Main Phase: You can Fusion Summon 1 "Hellvil" Fusion Monster by shuffling "Hellvil" monsters that are banished or in the GY into the Deck. You can only use this effect of "Dark Agreement with the Greatest Executor" once per turn. Once per turn, during your Standby Phase: Banish the top 3 cards from your Deck, face-down.
1966032.name: Dark Agreement with the Greatest Executor
1966032.treated_as: Dark Agreement with the Greatest Executor

1966164.effect:
You can only use this effect of "Dark Agreement with the Apocalypse Master" once per turn. During your Main Phase: You can activate 1 of these effects.
● Shuffle 1 "Hellvil" or "Dark Agreement" banished card into the Deck, then target 1 monster your opponent controls; shuffle it into the Deck
● Banish 1 "Hellvil" monster from your GY, then target 1 monster your opponent controls; return it to the hand.
Once per turn, during your Standby Phase: Banish the top 3 cards from your Deck, face-down.
1966164.name: Dark Agreement with the Apocalypse Master
1966164.treated_as: Dark Agreement with the Apocalypse Master

1966122.effect: While you control a "Hellvil" Fusion or Link Monster, "Dark Agreement" Spell/Traps you control cannot be destroyed by your opponent's card effects. You can banish 1 "Hellvil" or "Dark Agreement" card from your hand or GY, then target 1 "Hellvil" Fusion or Link monster in your GY; Special Summon it. You can only use this effect of "Dark Agreement with the Hellvil Destroyer" once per turn. Once per turn, during your Standby Phase: Banish the top 3 cards from your Deck, face-down.
1966122.name: Dark Agreement with the Hellvil Destroyer
1966122.treated_as: Dark Agreement with the Hellvil Destroyer

1966223.effect:
2+ "Hellvil" monsters with different names
Gains 400 ATK for each monster it points to. Once per turn, when a card or effect, is activated while all monsters you control are "Hellvil" monsters (Quick Effect): You can banish 1 card with that same card type (Monster, Spell, or Trap) from your hand, field or GY; negate the activation, and if you do, shuffle that card into the Deck. If this Link Summoned card is destroyed by battle or card effect and sent to the GY; You can shuffle 3 "Hellvil" or "Dark Agreement" banished cards into the Deck, and if you do, Special Summon this card. You can only use this effect of "Hellvil Royal Overlord Agdronnaath" once per turn.
1966223.name: Hellvil Royal Overlord Agdronnaath

1966204.effect:
2+ "Hellvil" monsters
If this card is Link Summoned: You can banish 1 "Hellvil" monster or 1 "Dark Agreement" Spell/Trap from your GY, then target 1 face-up monster your opponent controls; change it to face-down Defense Position. During your Main Phase (Quick Effect): You can shuffle 1 banished "Hellvil" or "Dark Agreement" card into the Deck, then target 1 monster your opponent controls; change that opponent's monster's ATK to 0, and if you do, negate its effects until the end of the turn. You can only use each effect of "Hellvil Prince Zannoroth" once per turn.
1966204.name: Hellvil Prince Zannoroth

1966200.effect:
2 "Hellvil" monsters
During your Main Phase: You can banish Spells/Traps your opponent controls, up to the number of linked "Hellvil" monsters on the field. You cannot conduct your Battle Phase the turn you activate this effect. If this face-up card is destroyed by battle, or leaves the field because of an opponent's card effect: You can target 3 banished cards; shuffle those targets into the Deck, and if you do, draw 1 card. You can only use each effect of "Hellvil King Vongrakon" once per turn
1966200.name: Hellvil King Vongrakon

1966179.effect:
1 "Hellvil" non-Link monster
During your Main Phase: You can target 1 "Hellvil" monster that is banished or in your GY; Special Summon it, but its effects are negated, also you cannot Special Summon monsters from the Extra Deck the turn you activated this effect, except Fiend monsters. You can only use this effect of "Hellvil Sovereign Zarnazoch" once per turn.
1966179.name: Hellvil Sovereign Zarnazoch

1966249.effect:
3+ "Hellvil" monsters
If this card is Fusion Summoned: Shuffle all banished cards into the Deck. This card gains 100 ATK for each card shuffled into the Main Deck by this effect. During your Main Phase (Quick Effect): You can target 1 monster your opponent controls; destroy it. You can only use each effect of "Hellvil Emperor Zolgomauth" once per turn.
1966249.name: Hellvil Emperor Zolgomauth

1966237.effect:
2+ "Hellvil" monsters
Cannot be destroyed by card effects. During your Main Phase: You can banish 1 "Hellvil" monster from your GY, and if you do, Special Summon 1 "Hellvil" monster from your hand, but it cannot be used as Fusion or Link Material, except for the Special Summon of a "Hellvil" monster. You can only use this effect of "Hellvil Ruler Sargronoth" once per turn. If this card destroys an opponent's monster by battle: this card gains 1000 ATK.
1966237.name: Hellvil Ruler Sargronoth

1966229.effect:
2 "Hellvil" monsters
If this card is Fusion Summoned: You can make this card gain ATK equal to the combined original ATK of the materials used to Summon it, until the end of this turn. If this card destroys an opponent's monster by battle: You can target 1 Spell/Trap your opponent controls; banish it. You can only use this effect of "Hellvil Counselor Solmimath" once per turn.
1966229.name: Hellvil Counselor Solmimath
